ygData.subject: Re: what ever happened to Grizzltron?

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Lunarpines miss shifted his gaze onto the bombs. "Oh slag" he yelped knowing
that the insane bot was willing to destroy them both to win this fight. He
transforms to full wolf mode and tries to escape. Rock and ice fell about a
step behind him as he ran. He could feel the heat comeing through the cave
from behind him.

The roof  cracked where Grizzltron hit it, it was made from Ice and snow
forming and freezing over an opening to either another part of the cave or
outside. (You decide) another good whack would allow Grizzltron to smash
through to safety.

A ball of flame chased the wolf as he ran at top speed towards the way he
came in. Lunarpine dodged as rocks fell nearly hitting him. The flames
creapt ever closer singeing his tail. The wolf was running out of breath
when he saw the light of the exit. Just as the flames were about to overtake
him Lunarpine dove out, rolling down the side of the hill, the flames
shooting out above him like a roman candle burning bright.

Ice landed near where Lunarpine lay panting. She transformed to her Polar
bear form and stuck her nose close. "Are you alright love?" she asked
outloud not wanting to find out if he's hurt telepathically.

Lunarpine rolled over, the fur on his back, tail, back legs, and rear end
were pretty badly burned. A natural wolf would have been paralyzed or worse
but since the Transformers were more than the normal animal he would be
alright. "Give me a few minutes to rest Wing." he said panting as he forced
himself up on his forelegs. "I'm just a little winded." The stubborn wolf
was to proud to admit that once again he'd let his feelings for her put him
in more trouble than he had to have.

Ice scanned the cave and mountain for any signs of thier attacker, the heat
and debris from the bomb made it hard for her to concentrate. She couldn't
get a lock to tell if Grizzletron was still functional.

Subject: Re: what ever happened to Grizzltron?


�Grizzltron�


   Grizzltron jumps backwards to dodge the slash.  He looks up at the
celling, redy to fire an optic to make the celling fall on his enemy's head,
when the two bombs he set earlier goes off.  He flies forward and up,
slamming into the celling over Lunarpines.
